body_html: I recently had a very similar issue, because I still had a stale configuration file (tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config.bzl) lying around. Checking it out again from master (essentially reverting all custom changes) fixed the problem.

body: I recently had a very similar issue, because I still had a stale configuration file (`tensorflow/core/platform/default/build_config.bzl`) lying around. Checking it out again from master (essentially reverting all custom changes) fixed the problem.
